goals: Find the sack with the gold.

api.name: weight
api.description: Returns the weight of the `Sack` objects.

params.name: sacks
params.description: A single `Sack` object or an array of `Sack` objects to weight.

api.name: weight
api.description: Returns the weight of the `Coin` objects.

params.name: coins
params.description: A single `Coin` object or an array of `Coin` objects to weight.

api.name: log
api.description: Writes logging output to the console.

member.name: find
member.description: Returns the `Sack` object with the gold.

params.name: sacks
params.description: An array of `Sack` objects. Each `Sack` offers one function:

properties.name: getCoins
properties.description: Retuns an array of `Coin` objects from the `Sack`.

params.name: numberOfCoins
params.description: The number of `Coin` objects to take out of the sack.
